name: Chao Chuan
description:
'''Chao Chuan''' ({{zh|c=趙傳|poj=Tiō Thoân|j=ziu6 cyun4|p=Zhào Chuán}}; born 18 June 1961), known sometimes as '''"Chief" Chao''', is a [[Taiwanese people|Taiwanese]] pop singer.

His breakthrough came with the song "I'm Ugly, but I'm Tender" ({{Lang|zh-tw|我很醜，可是我很溫柔}}) which was a giant hit in mainland China in 1988. His next major hit was "I'm Just a Little Bird" ({{Lang|zh-tw|我是一隻小小鳥}}, 1990).
